title: Rasooi Magic
details: Best of North Indian Cooking now in Mysore! Relish authentic and tasty gourmets. The magic of taste begins here at Rasooi.<div><br></div><div>Some of the notable services offered by Rasooi are:</div><div><br><div><div>1.Free Home Delivery within certain radious of the Restaurant</div><div>2.Outdoor Catering services for all occasions</div><div>3.Banquet Hall facility to accommodate 40-100 guests</div><div><br></div><div><br></div></div></div>

title: Pearl De Royal
address: Shop No. 2902/1, Opp. Post Office, Loyal World Complex, Temple Rd, V.V Mohalla, Vontikoppal, Mysuru, Karnataka 570002
details: <div>It's clientele are the local residents, unlike the ones located closer to the popular tourists circuit of Mysore. And mostly it is the younger lot - students and those working in companies around the area. And of course Pearl De Loyal is at the first floor of the popular Loyal World supermarket frequented by the local population. To that extend there is even an overflow from the shopping crowd.</div><div>The layout of the restaurant is in the classical kitchen overlooking the dining area style. It is reasonably spacious with many rows of tables.</div>

title: Coastal Garden
address: K R S Road, Opposite Falcon Tyre, Mysuru, Karnataka 570016
details: Coastal Garden, Mysore is a Mangalore style family restaurant which offers some of the finest handpicked specialties of Mangalore and Karavali Dishes along with Indian, Continental and Chinese food. Spread across a huge area, with in-door and open to the sky restaurant, Coastal Garden serves magnificent food in beautiful ambiance with warm heart! Elegant atmosphere, Sumptuous cuisine, Friendly attentive service makes Coastal Garden an ideal place for a relaxation with friends, family or business associates.<br>

title: Parklane Hotel Restaurant
address: Sri Harsha Rd, Lashkar Mohalla, Mandi Mohalla, Mysuru, Karnataka 570001
details: <div>Hotel Parklane, a time-honored family legacy welcomes you to an incredible experience of living in international standards.</div><div><br></div><div>Now, after major renovation and expansion more than doubling our size, we are featuring 30 creatively designed luxurious guest rooms, with a multi cuisine restaurants, a relaxing swimming pool and an option to shop for the finest Indian clothing and accessories. Parklane is now an ideal choice even for the most discerning of travelers as it is perfect for all budgets.</div><div><br></div>

title: Mezzaluna
address: 1st Floor, Kuvempu Trust Building, Kalidasa Road, Jayalakshmipuram, Mysuru, Karnataka 570012
details: The crave for your Italian food can be little reduced here.Do try it for the pastas and the lasagnas here .They are creamy and are of great quantity.You will suffice for the price they have put it on menu.The service is good and ambiance is too normal.<br>

title: Jalpaan Dining Saga
address: 66, JLB Road, Subbarayanakere, Chamrajpura, Near Ramaswamy Circle, Mysuru, Karnataka 570024
details: <div>As the name suggests, Jalpaan serves you everything from Jal to Paan i.e. from a good start of a meal to a grand end! &nbsp;They serve North Indian and Italian food.&nbsp;</div><div><br></div><div>It definitely makes a good vegetarian fine dining place with its classy and well designed decors. The service is commendable. At each stage there are people to guide you.</div>

title: Mughal Darbar
address: 11/5, Near RMC, New Sayyaji Rao Road, Mysuru, Karnataka 570021
details: <div><font color="#222222" face="arial, sans-serif"><span style="font-weight: normal;">For more than two decades, Mughal Durbar has been catering to the taste buds of Mysoreans, young and old alike. A name now synonymous with Biriyani and non-vegetarian food, Mughal Durbar continues to be the preferred lunch and dinner destination for Mysoreans and tourists.&nbsp;</span></font></div><div><font color="#222222" face="arial, sans-serif"><span style="font-weight: normal;"><br></span></font></div><div><font color="#222222" face="arial, sans-serif"><span style="font-weight: normal;">Its USP is the Biriyani made with both chicken and mutton. The Biriyani is cooked in typical Mughal fashion with the choicest of herbs and spices. It is prepared with premium quality Basmati rice. It is also patronised for its tasty Kebabs,Tandoor and Rumali Rotis.&nbsp;</span></font></div><div><font color="#222222" face="arial, sans-serif"><span style="font-weight: normal;"><br></span></font></div><div><font color="#222222" face="arial, sans-serif"><span style="font-weight: normal;">The service personnel leave no stone unturned in making your dining experience the best. The pleasing ambience and space put together with great taste and hygiene make Mughal Durbar a must-dine restaurant.</span></font></div><div><br></div>

title: The Old house
address: Shop No. # 451, JLB Road, Near Big Bazar, Chamarajapuram Mohalla, Mysuru, Karnataka 570004
details: The Old House is an Organic Italian Cuisine Restaurant located in Mysore, Karnataka (India) &nbsp;The Restaurant promises pizzas, pasta and pâtisserie.&nbsp;<br><div><br></div><div><div>AMBIANCE:</div><div><br></div><div>Classy Wooden Furniture surrounded by little pieces of art and greens, with options of sitting indoor and outdoor. By Late evenings- Dim Lights, bright trees and light-hearted music all add a romantic feel to the place. Although, its equally amazing to visit this place in the day – sunshine filtering through leaves,all around you – You know what I mean.</div><div>The Kitchen seems to be outdoor, so you can actually see them using fresh ingredients &nbsp;and placing (or, shoving) the pizza in the wood fired oven. Also, the desserts are put on display refrigerator, so you can choose what you’d like.</div><div>The Indoor sitting area is air conditioned and well lit. A Wall of Graffiti art and cozy sitting arrangements gives the place a young yet sophisticated appearance.</div></div>

title: Infinit Lounge Bar & Fine Dining
details: Global dishes, cocktails and beer offered in contemporary surrounds with a rooftop terrace.<br>

title: Gufha
address: Hotel Pai Vista, Mysore, 35/A, Bangalore-Nilgiri Road, Mysuru, Karnataka 570001
details: Multi-cuisine menus are served at this stylish hotel's extravagantly cave-themed dining room.<br>

title: Hotel Highway 18
address: State Highway 88, Hunsur Road, Sriramapura 2nd Stage, Vijayanagar, Mysore, Karnataka 570017
details: <div>This is one of the popular vegetarian restaurants in Mysore. Their menu have the typical vegetarian fanfare. The ambient looks a tad upscale with those cozy seats and the spacious interior.The evenings are quite busy, though they are open throughout the day. For those traveling by Hunsur Road (SH88) towards or out of Mysore city, this is a convenient restaurant to drive in.</div><div><br></div><div>What is special about the place is the outdoor dine setup on the lawn. So that makes Highway 18 one of the many restaurants in Mysore (Green Hotel, Hotel Regaalis, Silent Shores to name a few ) that have the open-air dining facility attached to it.</div><div>It seems kids too are happy with the tiny play area around the corder of the lawn.</div><div><br></div><div>Highway 18 restaurant is located some 5km on west of the city center, the Hunsur Road.</div>

title: Empire Restaurant Mysore
address: 2820/1, 8th Cross, Kalidasa Road, V. V. Mohalla, Mysuru, Karnataka 570002
details: <p>The First branch in Mysore was inaugurated on the 2nd of November and opened for business on the 3rd. The Mysore crowd was only too happy that Empire made its presence there as well.</p><p><br>The Restaurant is located on Kalidasa Road and is housed with 4 floors with a seating capacity of 300 and a party hall on the 2nd floor.</p><p><br>We have created a superb “homely feeling”<br>with beautiful lighting and music, to enhance the ambience…! It is totally a casual dining restaurant in a fine dining atmosphere. Lunch buffet is available everyday and savored by most Mysoreans. The parking space outside the restaurant and the basement is an added advantage.<br></p>

title: Madhva Bhavan Mysore
address: Vontikoppal, 6th Cross Rd, Vani Vilas Mohalla, Mysuru, Karnataka 570012
details: <p>Madhva Bhavan is the only restaurant in town which serves healthy heritage vegetarian/vegan food in a home kind atmosphere. </p><p>Anima Madhva Bhavan is a concept restaurant which serves authentic, delicious, Mysore heritage food.&nbsp;</p><p><span class="_xdb"><a class="fl" href="https://www.google.co.in/search?client=firefox-b-ab&amp;q=anima+madhva+bhavan+hours&amp;stick=H4sIAAAAAAAAAOPgE-LRT9c3zMg1LMwwq6jSks5OttLPyU9OLMnMz4MzrDLyS4uKAabejoUtAAAA&amp;sa=X&amp;ved=0ahUKEwi919_7tKfPAhWCjJQKHTsKDFgQ6BMImAEwFA" data-ved="0ahUKEwi919_7tKfPAhWCjJQKHTsKDFgQ6BMImAEwFA"><font color="#0066cc">Hours</font></a>:</span></p><div class="_tDe r-iLHR80ezmC80" style="display: inline;" jsl="$t t-9RdNJJYI2N0$t-VVcBO8m2eHg;$x 0;"><div class="vk_bk h_n" style="display: inline;" data-ved="0ahUKEwi919_7tKfPAhWCjJQKHTsKDFgQoT4ImQEwFA" jsaction="oh.swap"><span class="_bC" style="display: inline;"><a class="fl" href="javascript:void(0)"><font color="#0066cc"><span class="_r4"><span class="_YMh">12–3:30PM</span></span><span class="_XMh">, </span><span class="_r4"><span class="_YMh">5:30–11:30PM</span><span class="_nTh"></span></span></font></a></span></div></div>

title: Tonif Restaurant
address: Infosys Mysore Road, Opp. Gate No. 2, Hebbal Indutrail Area, Mysuru, Karnataka 570018
details: Famous Dishes:<br><br>Paneer, dhal and vegetable dishes are on the menu at this basic north Indian and Punjabi restaurant.<br>

title: Green Leaf
address: No 2813, 10th Cross , K D road, VV Mohalla, Mysore, Karnataka, 570002, Indi
details: Green leaf is quite a popular breakfast place among the local crowds. Even though the restaurant opens up as early as 7 in the morning, drop in after 10 to avoid the morning rush, as the restaurant is filled to the brim with college students and office-goers. The selection of authentic South Indian breakfast, fresh juices and coffee makes this restaurant one of the best places for breakfast.<br><br><br><br>

title: Oyster Bay Mysore
address: Kannada Parishath Road, Vijayanagar 1st Stage, Mysuru, Karnataka 570017
details: Complimentary breakfast and free unlimited Wi-Fi awaits you at all OYO properties. The hotel has a banquet hall, conference room and an in-house restaurant &amp; bar for you to organize any social gathering or have a peaceful dinner with your loved ones. The 24 hour front desk facilitates payment through cards, dry cleaning &amp; laundry service, fax or photocopy and wake up call service if needed. Additionally, the hotel also has a lobby, parking facility, cloak room, lift for your easy movement, power backup, fire safety, smoke detectors &amp; first aid and round the clock security for your comfort and safety. It also has a provision of wheel chair for the ones in need.<br><div><br></div><div>It brings the feeling of a very nice and plush place to start out a dinner at. The ambiance, the outdoor setting up of the chairs and the cool wind to welcome is more than to ask for. It would still remain in one of the top ten restaurants in Mysore to spend some good time.<br></div>

title: By The Way Multicuisine Restaurant
address: Ring Road, Near HCG Hospital, Hebbal Industrial Area, Mysore, Karnataka 570016
details: By The Way is a awesome casual dining place with a large lawn and a water body, a goan theme shack. It's an ideal place to relax amidst serene ambiance.<br><div><br></div><div>Hotel Stay By The Way, Mysore, is a 3-star deluxe business hotel located in the heart of Mysore's corporate, IT and industrial hub. The hotel is very close to large IT companies like Infosys, Wipro, L&amp;T etc. and is strategically located right on the Ring Road, thus enabling quick and easy access.&nbsp;</div><div><br></div><div>Hotel Stay By The Way, Mysore, is known to offer some of the best rooms in Mysore. It has 32 well furnished, air-conditioned rooms spread over 3 floors.<br></div>

title: Barbeque Nation
address: Ground Floor, BM Habitat Mall,, Mangalore-Mysore Hwy, Jayalakshmipuram, Mysuru, Karnataka 570012
details: Barbeque Nation is an Indian restaurant chain owned by Indore-based Sayaji Hotels Limited. The first restaurant opened in Mumbai in January 2006. The restaurant chain also has private equity firm CX Partners as its investor.<br>

title: Olive Garden
address: Next to Jayachamaraja Golf Club  Maharanapratap Road, Nazarbad,  Chamundipuram, Mysore,  Karnataka
details: Opening hours<br>Today&nbsp; 9:30 AM to 10 PM<br><br>Highlights<br>Breakfast<br>Smoking Area<br>Buffet<br>Outdoor Seating<br><br>Cuisines<br>Italian, Continental, North Indian, Chinese<br><br><br><br>
